explains: adv. 熟悉地；亲切地；私下地

sentences.en: He did not feel he had got to know them intimately.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己不必和他们亲密熟悉。

sentences.en: She was intimately involved in the project.
sentences.cn: 她已投入到这个项目中。

sentences.en: It was the first time they had attempted to talk intimately.
sentences.cn: 这是他们第一次试图私下交谈。
